review: rubbish story, even worse acting and an awful awful song every 10 mins. was excruciatingly painful to be able to get through this pathetic piece of work. same ages old formula , rehashed action scenes from transporter, matrix and others.one big zero for creativity or originality. it looks as if nobody was bothered to make an effort to step up and raise their game. lazy lazy film making, but then 99% of bollywood movies are like it or worse, so what more can be said? film makers are happy to produce trash like this, and people are happy to shell out hundreds and hundreds to watch them, so it is a win win for both.  ğŸ˜
